code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import{CButton}from'@coreui/react';import FancyText from'@carefully-coded/react-text-gradient';import'../css/Home.css';import Home_pic from'../assets/images/hello.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=_ref=>{let{handleMenuItemClick}=_ref;const contactsRef=useRef(null);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home_container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home_item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"home_h1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FancyText,{gradient:{from:'#F858E0',to:'#77156C',type:'linear'},animateTo:{from:'#6DEDD0',to:'#7AE23A'},animateDuration:2000,children:"Hello !"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"home_name",children:"C'est Don Mariot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"home_text",style:{textAlign:'justify'},children:"D\xE9veloppeur fullstack passionn\xE9 par l'innovation, je mets mon expertise technique au service de la cr\xE9ation d'applications performantes et intuitives."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CButton,{className:"btn_home",color:"info",variant:"outline",shape:"rounded-pill",onClick:()=>handleMenuItemClick("Contacts"),ref:contactsRef,children:"Me contacter"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Home_pic,alt:"hello !",style:{position:'absolute',top:'42%',right:'30%',transform:'translateY(-60%)',width:'22%',height:'auto'}})]});};export default Home;
